item.title: Avoid insanity when handling errors with Chai
item.description: If you ever played Farcry3 for sure you will remember the guy in the picture, if you never hear about him, Take a look on this video, The definition of insanity - Far Cry 3. While coding some unit tests for the SmallFlatWorld server, I got myself in a very interesting situation, where my old Java memories guided me to implement a test in a specific way, while some documentation was pointing in another direction… Well Vaas has a point, repeating the same thing over and over and expecting the same results it’s kinda insane.
